name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CopyClip - Clipboard History Management Side Panel

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A clipboard history tool that allows you to copy and paste from your clipboard history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CopyClip is your essential Chrome extension for managing clipboard history with ease. Designed to alleviate the frustration of losing previously copied text, CopyClip logs and organizes your clipboard activity, allowing you to revisit and reuse any copied content effortlessly.

Never lose important copied text again! CopyClip addresses the common pain point of losing track of copied items. Whether you’re working on multiple documents, coding, researching, or managing extensive text, CopyClip ensures that all your copied items are just a click away, saving you time and boosting productivity.

Key Features:
---------------------------------------------
	•	Real-time Clipboard Logging: Continuously monitors and logs your clipboard content.
	•	Persistent Background Operation: Keeps logging clipboard content even when the side panel is not active.
	•	Comprehensive Clipboard History: Provides a chronological list of all copied text, making it easy to revisit and reuse.
	•	User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for quick access and navigation.
	•	Includes a "Pin" options for frequently used clipboard items.
	•	Secure and Private: Logs clipboard content locally without sending data to external servers.


How It Works:
---------------------------------------------
	1.	Install CopyClip from the Chrome Web Store.
	2.	Click the CopyClip icon in the toolbar to open the side panel.
	3.	Copy any text, and CopyClip will automatically log and display it in real-time.
	4.	View your clipboard history in the side panel, allowing you to quickly find and reuse any copied item.


Data Privacy & Security
---------------------------------------------
Your clipboard data is not logged, saved, shared sent or used anywhere but by you.
